data.title: Famous People Born in 1956
data.meta_description: Celebrate the birthdays of 818 famous people, historical figures and celebrities born in 1956 like Homer Simpson, Tom Hanks and Martina Navratilova.
data.text:
Birthdays 1 - 200 of 818

Abdalla Hamdok, Sudanese politician (Prime Minister of Sudan 2021-22), born in Al Dibaibat, Sudan

Christine Lagarde
